metadata.name: Reroll Dice can Expire!
metadata.description:
Think the D Infinity is too strong? Want your D4 runs to be even more chaotic??
This mod adds a sense of impermanence to the D4, D100, and DInfinity. Every reroll has a 10% chance to remove the die, leaving you stuck with your latest reroll. For the D Infinity, this only occurs when it imitates the D4 or D100.
